argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mrcfval.f | |- F = ( mrCls ` C ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mrcid | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U e. C ) -> ( F ` U ) = U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ ( F ` U ) = U ) -> ( F ` U ) = U ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_mrcssv | |- ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) -> ( F ` U ) C_ X ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ ( F ` U ) = U ) -> ( F ` U ) C_ X ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_eqsstr3d | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ ( F ` U ) = U ) -> U C_ X ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_mrccl | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( F ` U ) e. C ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ ( F ` U ) = U ) -> ( F ` U ) e. C ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ ( F ` U ) = U ) -> U e. C ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_impbida | |- ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) -> ( U e. C <-> ( F ` U ) = U ) ) |
